title: Your favorite champion is now the antagonist of your last played NON league game.
body:
What happens?

GG {{champion:122}} with the triforce of power. Hyrule is doomed.

replies.body: {{champion:33}}  is now a Sith Lord. May the force be with us all...

"Destroy the Jedi Order!"

{{champion:33}} "Ok."

"Execute Order 66!"

{{champion:33}} "Ok."
Darth Spinnious.
Karma the monk has invaded Sleeping dogs and is now the most Gangster monk you'll ever witness.

{{champion:117}}  kidnapped Peach and wants to conquer the whole Universe

She trained a lot her Wild Growth, because she's fucking big now (Super Mario Galaxy 2)

{{champion:111}} is the antagonist of Kirby Triple Deluxe.

"Aaaaaaaaaaaalllllllllllllllllllllllll willlllllllllllllllllllllllllllll drooooooooooowwwwwwwwwwwwnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnnn"

He floods Floralia and, when Floralia's residents throw the Dreamstalk to Dreamland to have Kirby save them, he just floods Dreamland too.
{{champion:14}} in Dragon Age. He'd be a pretty cool boss fight, I guess.
Nothing can be worse than Corypheus from DAI.
{{champion:112}} is attempting to merge the realm of Coldharbour with that of Tamriel. The heroes of Tamriel must rise up and stop him.

{{champion:21}} in Splatoon. 

Be careful you little inklings, she doesn't shoot ink.

Amaterasu vs. Zac... 

I would just create a suit for Zac.

Gerald of Rivia vs. The Emperor of Shurima {{champion:268}} .


.....

Welp, I'm screwed.
{{champion:117}} has decided to help Lu Bu unify china? And only because she thinks they must be related because their names are so similar? THIS IS THE GREATEST THING EVER
{{champion:157}} in witcher 3, gg im fukd...
Jinx is after the Skullheart. I cannot image how much crazier she's going to get.

My last non league game is a sex game
and my favorite champion is jayce
SWEET
but he's the antagonist, which means his goal will be to make you not have sex.

in sex games the goal is to see who can fuck harder
you fuck the antoganist

no the antagonists goal is something that is impeding the goal of the protagonist. in the game you're the protagonist, and your goal is to have sex, and the antagonists goal then would need to be something that prevented you from achieving yours, which means jayces goal would need to be something along the lines of you not having sex.

How did we get to having a discussion of what the antagonist does in a sex game?

~Wpx

Oh, dear, Ezreal running the Vasari? (Sins of a Solar Empire: Rebellion) Oh dear.

~Wpx

{{champion:103}} Just replaced Deviljho... 
https://youtu.be/ALue3HHH5WY

{{champion:42}} in Ace Combat Infinity? Well he does love a good dog fight in the morning.

So. . . where does Godzilla fit in this?
{{champion:64}} as Senator Armstrong. Raiden is boned.
{{champion:107}} Is Mom in binding of isaac? Ok so a cat with a knife, red heels, and ultra-chunky legs. I will not sleep for at least forever.

{{champion:223}}  I'll tell ya. Racing in a kart racewith Mario for the eight time seems weird.
{{champion:432}} Is now Team Magma in ORAS
{{champion:150}} Is the one destroying Skyrim
{{champion:37}}  is now in Smash Brothers as the final boss
{{champion:56}} in bloodborne, the game didn't actually change much, i think his e gives me insight now.

{{champion:120}} with Frostmourne. {{champion:102}} turning into Deathwing as her ult. {{champion:16}} being the most powerful mortal warlock in Azeroth.
GG EZ FREE LOOT

hmmm sona and smash bros.....
im screwed with q spams

Me: Azir, why tf are you in a visual novel
Azir: Your Emperor has returned(Bangs all the heroines)
BAD END GG 10/10
well now im an assassin trying to kill emperor {{champion:119}}  in skyrim

Eternal Darkness: Sanity's Requiem... Instead of Ulyaoth, the diety hell-bent on destroying humanity is Soraka.{{champion:16}} 

That's actually kind of terrifying.
{{champion:103}}  in hearthstone idk what so shes a  priest who always gets the divine spirt inner fire combo

{{champion:67}} is now one of the many 12 year old snipers from Unturned. 

Sadly auto attacks can't miss ;_;
{{champion:53}} I'm gonna have a rough time scoring on goalkeeper blitzcrank in Fifa 15 D:

{{champion:131}} 
Would you kindly... bring down the sun!

{{champion:62}} is now a mincraft mob

* breaks armor- ***check***

* can jump to you making him attack faster- ***check***

* can knock you into the air- ***check***

* can create decoys so half the time you hit nothing- ***check***

... I think I'll just stay in my house made of dirt ty

Terraria is my last-played game, so...

{{champion:102}} would be a disappointingly easy boss fight because of how easy it is to kite in Terraria.  But at least she'd turn into an NPC and move into a house when defeated.
{{champion:143}} would roam the Jungle and turn into Plantera when killed.
{{champion:112}} would, when attacked, summon The Twins, The Destroyer, and Skeletron Prime to fight alongside him.  The trick of the whole fight would be actually targeting Viktor.
{{champion:89}} committed murder and framed {{champion:131}} for it. Now Phoenix Wright is defending Diana in court.
Well, the Guardians from Destiny now have ANOTHER faction to protect earth from.  {{champion:90}}, you're my favorite, but I'm going to have to fight the void with my friends here.

Apparently {{champion:134}} replaced either Alduin or Miraak.
I wonder how the final fight would look li- _**CTD due to too many balls**_
Lux is now Malak, Sith Lord. Taris is screwed in a whole new way...

So Rumble is the antagonist of sushi cat-a-pult.... ummmmm... ok.

In case you don't know what sushi cat-a-pult is, here: http://armorgames.com/play/17614/sushi-cat-a-pult
You thought Robo-Fortune was going to be the last DLC character they give out? THINK AGAIN, {{champion:9}} STEPS IN TO... GET ~~and fuck~~ BITCHES!
God dammit, Lux. Why must you become evil and want to take over a kingdom? (Child of Light.)

{{champion:21}} either becomes a Marvel Heroes villain...or is somehow the enemy in Atelier Escha & Logy. 

Either way, she'll be another dry character you have to murder...but at least she'll look cool.
{{champion:37}} is an arcane mage in Azeroth? I'm fine with that.
{{champion:37}} She probably rocks at Crypt of the Necrodancer
